attributes.action: Commission research re applying spray foam insulation in buildings.
attributes.additional_details: I do not consider it appropriate for little old ladies etc to be bounced into installing spray foam insulation in their homes by persuasive salesman spinning ½ a story and then facing a bill to remove it as and when they learn more.
attributes.background:
There is much concern about energy costs and the implications of applying spray foam insulation in buildings as this House of Commons Library note explains
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/spray-foam-insulation-and-mortgages/

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about spray foam insulation, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government to commission research into.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
